item.title: Using C to Identify Valid Credit Card Numbers
item.description: Problem Create a program that uses Luhn’s Algorithm to identify if the input number is a valid credit card number for AMEX, MASTERCARD, and VISA. Breaking Down the Problem Basic Characteristics of Credit Card Numbers Luhn’s Algorithm Not only does the number have to fit the requirements above, it also needs to be validated through Luhn’s Algorithm which is as follows: My Solution Logical Steps Get input Number from User (only receive valid integers) > Copy the Card Number twice to perform loops for Step 1 and 2 > Loop Step 1 > Loop Step 2 > Calculate digit of number > Check if it passes all requirements > Use switch/case to identify which card 1.
